thread.title_full: Karen Ristevski's friends remember her 'beautiful soul' | Daily Mail Online

author: Daniel Piotrowski In Melbourne For Daily Mail Australia
title: Karen Ristevski's friends remember her 'beautiful soul' | Daily Mail Online
text: EXCLUSIVE - 'She was a beautiful soul': Karen Ristevski's school friend reveals murdered mum wanted to gift her a glamorous dress to make her feel better as she battled cancer Karen Ristevski's body was discovered concealed in bushland on Monday While police search for who killed her, friends have recalled her 'beautiful soul' Sharryn Hili recalled her offering a free gown to a childhood friend with cancer Ms Ristevski hadn't seen the friend in 25 years, but made the offer as soon as she found out the woman was suffering Published: 06:22 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 09:13 GMT, 23 February 2017 29 shares
